insert into five_ed_plot_apply (business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, major_name, plot_time, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, remark ) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plotTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update five_ed_plot_apply set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plot_time = #{plotTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, major_name, plot_time, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, remark from five_ed_plot_apply where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, major_name, plot_time, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, remark from five_ed_plot_apply
